stageList.title: Basement Entrance
stageList.desc: Inquisitors have transformed the branch facility into a torture chamber for prosthesis users, committing bloodcurdling murders. The townsfolk were powerless against the torment.

stageList.title: Basement Entrance
stageList.desc: We met a dying Saude next to the entrance. No one could answer her desperate question about Effie's status truthfully.

stageList.title: Basement Entrance
stageList.desc: Inquisitors have transformed the branch facility into a torture chamber for prosthesis users, committing bloodcurdling murders. The townsfolk were powerless against the torment.

stageList.title: Machinery Room
stageList.desc: We met a dying Saude next to the entrance. No one could answer her desperate question about Effie's status truthfully.

stageList.title: Machinery Room
stageList.desc: We met a dying Saude next to the entrance. No one could answer her desperate question about Effie's status truthfully.

stageList.title: Machinery Room
stageList.desc: We met a dying Saude next to the entrance. No one could answer her desperate question about Effie's status truthfully.

stageList.title: Containment Area
stageList.desc: Even after several battles, Guido still pursues us with terrifying persistence. We put a stop to him at last, and leaving Saude behind, we proceeded to the next area. Everything was a terrible mess, and no one had the energy to talk.

stageList.title: Gate #1
stageList.desc: Even after several battles, Guido still pursues us with terrifying persistence. We put a stop to him at last, and leaving Saude behind, we proceeded to the next area. Everything was a terrible mess, and no one had the energy to talk.

stageList.title: Sealed Door
stageList.desc: I hear sounds of something scuttling on the floor. I wonder what it might be, but part of me doesn't want to find out.

stageList.title: Forgotten Passage
stageList.desc: Even after several battles, Guido still pursues us with terrifying persistence. We put a stop to him at last, and leaving Saude behind, we proceeded to the next area. Everything was a terrible mess, and no one had the energy to talk.

stageList.title: Prison Area
stageList.desc: Fighting off corroded inquisitors, we made our way to the Golden Bough.

stageList.title: Corroded Entity Containment Block
stageList.desc: I hear sounds of something scuttling on the floor. I wonder what it might be, but part of me doesn't want to find out.

stageList.title: Church Corridor
stageList.desc: We reached the next floor. All around us were torture devices, bits of flesh, and dying townsfolk succumbing to pain. The least bearable of them all is the periodic whistles.

stageList.title: Ritual Square
stageList.desc: The area has transformed into endless hills of corpses due to the Golden Bough's influence. You see inquisitors praying to somebody.

stageList.title: Ritual Square
stageList.desc: Hearing bells that may be familiar to some and new to others, we peek into Sinclair's past. He sits in the middle of a lively classroom, full of chatty students.

stageList.title: Ritual Square
stageList.desc: The flashbacks to a ruin that ravaged Sinclair's life in a storm come to an end. Kromer is the only one with feelings to show, and that is an uncontainable satisfaction.
